definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
Dai Temple, a temple in Shandong for the god of Mount Tai
acolyte in charge of incense in a temple
temple name of a deceased Chinese emperor
lit. surging waters flooded the Dragon King temple (idiom)/fig. to fail to recognize a familiar person/a dispute between close people who fail to recognize each other

definition: Kuanmiao township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: He who does good comes to the temple gate, he who loves reaches the shrine.
sentences.chinese: 行善的人来到庙门口，兼爱的人走进大殿堂。

sentences.english: East Cooper hospital has a temple, wall stone tablet book "Han Park first."
sentences.chinese: 庙东院有古柏一株，墙外碣书“汉柏第一”。

sentences.english: Then they carried the ark into Dagon's temple and set it beside Dagon.
sentences.chinese: 非利士人将神的约柜抬进大衮庙，放在大衮的旁边。

sentences.english: The monk can run away, but he can run with the temple.
sentences.chinese: 要不然跑得了和尚，跑不了庙啊。

sentences.english: This temple mainly adjoins the Chinese zither one of for Indian Lord to construct.
sentences.chinese: 这座庙主要为印度主神之一毗瑟挐而建。

sentences.english: Health in the central part of the island to a famous temple monkeys, and monkeys in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在岛中部的生宜有著名的猴子庙，猴子成群结队。

sentences.english: As so often, apparently, the fox shrine was a hidden-away part of a larger and more public temple-complex.
sentences.chinese: 很显然，公众熟悉的大的寺庙常常刻意隐藏狐仙庙。

sentences.english: Qingxian a village 6 km south, called "The tape ancient", the village west seat plate Temple.
sentences.chinese: 青县城南6公里有村曰“大盘古”，村西有座盘古庙。

sentences.english: Shall I take a picture for you with this temple as the background?
sentences.chinese: 我以这个庙为背景帮您张相照好吗？

sentences.english: This temple served for an operating room during the Anti-Japanese War.
sentences.chinese: 在抗战时期这座庙曾用来作手术室。

sentences.english: It was the largest temple in the whole country, and the emperor told his men to take me there.
sentences.chinese: 那是全国最大的庙，皇帝叫他的属下把我载到那里。

sentences.english: Yes. This temple was built ingeniously.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那座庙建造得还很巧妙呢。

sentences.english: You can’t see it because it is covered with fog. Although you can’t see it, I know it is there.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，庙就在那儿，你看不见是因为它被雾遮盖住了。

sentences.english: This statue was found in Temple T at Kawa , in Upper Nubia.
sentences.chinese: 这座雕像被发现在庙由T佤，在上努比亚。

sentences.english: The temples were closed, and this sort of thing simply wasn't allowed.
sentences.chinese: 过去庙都给关了，这样烧香拜佛是不允许的。

sentences.english: We then found the Confucious Temple which was closed and seemed in poor repair.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们发现了孔子庙，庙是关闭的，好像在维修。
